;(this.window||module)[this.window?"Events":"exports"]=function(n){var t={};n=n||this,n.on=function(n,f,i){(t[n]=t[n]||[]).push({f:f,c:i})},n.off=function(n,f){n||(t={});for(var i=t[n]||[],o=i.length=f?i.length:0;o-->0;)f==i[o].f&&i.splice(o,1)},n.emit=function(){for(var n,f=Array.apply([],arguments),i=t[f.shift()]||[],o=0;n=i[o++];)n.f.apply(n.c,f)}};
/**
 * Valida se o usuário está habilitado para usar a API localStorage.
 * https://gist.github.com/gustavopaes/6024904
 * @type {Boolean}
 */
var storageValidation = (function(window) {
  'use strict';
  var validation;
  try {
    // IE <= 9 e demais navegadores devem retornar TRUE
    validation = !!window.localStorage;
    // Se estiver em modo Private no Safari, DOM Exception será retornado,
    // alegando falta de espaço para armazenamento.
    if(validation === true) {
      localStorage.setItem('__test', '');
      localStorage.removeItem('__test');
    }
  } catch(e) {
    // possível erro de Access Denied no IE 10 ou
    // modo private no Safari.
    validation = false;
  }
  return validation;
}(window));
/*!
 * read/save storage content
 */
var storage = (function() {
  'use strict';
  /**
   * Retorna um conteúdo salvo no localStorage.
   * @param {String} name Nome da chave
   * @return {JSON}
   * @return {String}
   */
  function getItem(name) {
    if(storageValidation === true) {
      var item = localStorage.getItem(name);
      if(item !== null) {
        // tenta parsear um possível json
        try {
          item = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(name));
        } catch(e) {}
      }
      return item;
    } else {
      return getCookie(name);
    }
  }
  /**
   * Retorna o conteúdo de um cookie
   * @param {String} name Nome da chave
   * @return {String}
   */
  function getCookie(name) {
    var re1 = new RegExp(name+'=','g');
    var re2 = new RegExp('.*?'+name+'=(.*?)(\;.*?$|$)','g');
    if(document.cookie.match(re1)) {
      var value = document.cookie.replace(re2,'$1');
      return unescape(value);
    }
    return null;
  }
  /**
   * Salva um item no localStorage
   * Se o `value` não for string, tenta um JSON.stringify().
   * @param {String} name
   * @param {String} value
   */
  function setItem(name, value) {
    if(storageValidation === true) {
      try {
        if(typeof value !== 'string') {
          value = JSON.stringify(json);
        }
      } catch(e) {}
      localStorage.setItem(name, value);
      return value;
    } else {
      return setCookie(name, value, 15);
    }
  }
  /**
   * Remove um item no localStorage
   * @param {String} name
   */
  function removeItem(name){
    if(storageValidation === true) {
      localStorage.removeItem(name);
    } else {
      removeCookie(name);
    }
  }
  /**
   * Remove um cookie
   * @param {String} name
   */
  function removeCookie(name, domain) {
    document.cookie = name + '=;expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:01 GMT' + '; path=/; '+(domain ? 'domain='+domain : '');
  }
  /**
   * Salva um cookie.
   */
  function setCookie(name, value, expires, domain) {
    value = escape(value); // aplica `escape` devido a bug no safari
    var de = new Date();
    if(expires) {
      de.setDate(de.getDate() + expires);
    }
    document.cookie = name + "=" + value + (expires?'; expires=' + de.toUTCString():'') + '; path=/; '+(domain ? 'domain='+domain : '');
  }
  return {
    storageValidation: storageValidation,
    getItem: getItem,
    getCookie: getCookie,
    setItem: setItem,
    setCookie: setCookie,
    removeItem: removeItem,
    removeCookie: removeCookie
  };
})();
/**
 * Eventos da home UOL.
 *
 * jsReady: disparado quando o home.js é carregado.
 * htmlReady: disparado no fim do carregamento da página, antes do carregamento do banner.
 * ready: disparado quando o app é finalizado.
 *
 * Métodos: on / off / emit
 */
var hevents = (function() {
  // Indica o status do JS e HTML.
  // Quando todos estiverem `true` o `Core.init` é disparado.
  var hReady = {
    js: false,
    html: false
  };
  function ifReadyThenInit() {
    if(hReady.js && hReady.html) {
      //console.log('[ready] Core.init('+(+new Date() - inHeadTS)+')');
      homeUOL.init();
    }
  }
  var evs = new Events();
  evs.on('jsReady', function() {
    hReady.js = true;
    ifReadyThenInit();
  });
  evs.on('htmlReady', function() {
    hReady.html = true;
    ifReadyThenInit();
  });
  return evs;
})();
// scripts para serem executados depois do carregamento
// do script principal da home.
function waitThen(callback, scope) {
  window.homeUOL && homeUOL.ready === true ?
    callback.call(scope) :
      hevents.on('ready', callback, scope);
}
// usocket Config
var usocketConfig = {
  'domain': 'rthome.uol.com',
  'forcePolling': false,
  'pollingDelay': 10000
};
    ;(function () {
  'use strict';
  var overrideWurfl = {};
  var theUA;
  var de = '';
  overrideWurfl = {
    list: [
      // User agent do simulador Opera Mobile Emulator
      'Opera/\d{0,1}\.\d{0,3}(.*)(; Opera Mobi\/)(.*)(Presto\/)',
      // Androids novos
      '(Android 4.)',
      // Blackberry 10
      '(BB10)',
      // Nokia Windows Phone
      '(Lumia)',
      // Generic
      '(Mobile)',
      '(iPhone)',
      // Windows Phone geral
      '(Windows Phone)'
    ],
    blackList: [
      'iPad',
      'Xoom',
      'MZ604',
      'GT-P5100',
      'GT-P1000'
    ],
    init: function () {
      var search = location.search.toString();
      var marrakeshCookie = /.*?x-user-agent-class=(.*?)(\;.*?$|$)/g;
      var userAgentCookie = unescape( document.cookie.replace( marrakeshCookie, '$1' ) ).toUpperCase();
      var theUA = navigator.userAgent.toString();
      var listSize = overrideWurfl.list.length;
      var blackListSize = overrideWurfl.blackList.length;
      if( userAgentCookie === 'WEB' ) {
        hevents.on('htmlReady', function() {
          document.body.className += ' handheld';
        });
        return;
      }
      while ( blackListSize-- ) {
        if( theUA.match( overrideWurfl.blackList[ blackListSize ] ) ){
          // Aparelho encontra-se na blacklist, não faz nada
          return false;
        }
      };
      // Verifica se o apareho encontra-se na lista de aplicativos que
      // devem ser considerados mobile
      while ( listSize-- ) {
        if ( theUA.match( overrideWurfl.list[ listSize ] ) !== null ) {
          var uaCookie = unescape( document.cookie.replace( marrakeshCookie, '$1' ) );
          // Checa se é mobile, mas optou por ver web
          if ( uaCookie !== 'WEB' ) {
            de = new Date();
            de.setDate( de.getDate() + 4 );
            // Define o cookie SMART com data + 4 dias
            document.cookie = 'x-user-agent-class=SMART; expires=' + de.toUTCString() + '; path=/;domain=.uol.com.br';
            // Recarrega no novo template
            window.location.reload();
          }
        }
      }
    }
  };
  overrideWurfl.init();
}());
    window.onHomeReady = waitThen;
    ;(function(window) {
  'use strict';
  /**
   * Valida se um item está no array.
   * @param {Array} arr
   * @param {Any} item
   * @param {Int} index
   */
  function _contains(arr, item) {
    if( arr ) {
      arr = typeof arr === 'string' ? arr.split(',') : arr;
      for(var i = 0, m = arr.length; i < m; i++) {
        if(arr[i] == item) {
          return i;
        }
      }
    }
    return -1;
  }
  /**
   * Classe que trabalha com os dados do TailTarget.
   */
  function User() {
    this.u = null;
    // Contantes para os códigos de interesses e assuntos (clusters)
    // para facilitar a leitura do código.
    this.CARS = 'CA6824';
    this.RECIPES = 'CA7357';
    try {
      this.u = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('uolDataLayer'));
      this.u = this.u.TailtargetTrack ? this.u.TailtargetTrack : null;
    } catch(e) { }
    return this;
  }
  /**
   * Retorna se o usuário possui interesse em um assunto.
   * @param {Int} Código do assunto de interesse ou cluster
   * @param {Boolean}
   */
  User.prototype.hasInterest = function(what) {
    if(this.u === null) {
      return false;
    }
    return _contains(what.toString().match(/^CA/)?this.u.tt_customaudience:this.u.tt_subjects, what) !== -1;
  };
  window.TTUser = new User();
})(window);
    window.universal_variable = window.universal_variable || {};
    window.universal_variable.sc = window.universal_variable.sc || {};
    window.universal_variable.sc.abTest = window.universal_variable.sc.abTest || [];
    var interestsId = {
      'CA6824' : 'carros',
      'CA7357' : 'receitas'
    };
    for(var interest in interestsId){
      if( TTUser.hasInterest(interest) == true ) {
                window.universal_variable.sc.abTest.push(interestsId[interest]);
      }
    }
    </script>

  uol_sc.TimeParting = function (t, z) {
    var dc = new Date('1/1/2000');
      if (dc.getDay() != 6 || dc.getMonth() !== 0) {
      return 'Data Not Available';
    } else {
      z = parseFloat(z);
      var dsts = new Date(uol_sc.dstStart),
        dste = new Date(uol_sc.dstEnd),
        cd = new Date(),
        utc = cd.getTime() + (cd.getTimezoneOffset() * 60000);
        if (cd > dsts && cd < dste) {
        z = z + 1;
      } else {
        z = z;
      }
        var tz = new Date(utc + (3600000 * z)),
        thisy = tz.getFullYear(),
        days = ['Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday'];
        if (thisy != uol_sc.currentYear) {
        return 'Data Not Available';
      } else {
        var thish = tz.getHours(),
          thismin = tz.getMinutes(),
          thisd = tz.getDay(),
          dow = days[thisd],
          ap = 'AM',
          dt = 'Weekday',
          mint = '00';
          if (thismin > 30) {
          mint = '30';
        }
        if (thish >= 12) {
          ap = 'PM';
          thish = thish - 12;
        }
        if (thish === 0) {
          thish = 12;
        }
        if (thisd == 6 || thisd === 0) {
          dt = 'Weekend';
        }
          var timestring = thish +':'+ mint + ap;
                if (t == 'h') {
          return timestring;
        }
        if (t == 'd') {
          return dow;
        }
        if (t == 'w') {
          return dt;
        }
      }
    }
  };
  uol_sc.p_gpv = function (k, u) {
    var v = '',
      i = u.indexOf('?'),
      q;
      if (k && i >- 1) {
      q = u.substring(i + 1);
      v = uol_sc.pt(q, '&', 'p_gvf', k);
    }
      return v;
  };
  uol_sc.getQueryParam = function (p, d, u) {
    var v = '',
      i, t;
      d = d ? d : '';
    u = u ? u : (uol_sc.pageURL ? uol_sc.pageURL : uol_sc.wd.location);
      while (p) {
      i = p.indexOf(',');
      i = i < 0 ? p.length : i;
      t = uol_sc.p_gpv(p.substring(0, i), u + '');
        if (t) {
        v += v ? d + t : t;
      }
      p = p.substring(i == p.length ? i : i + 1);
    }
      return v;
  };
  uol_sc.p_gvf = function (t, k) {
    if (t) {
      var i = t.indexOf('='),
        p = i < 0 ? t : t.substring(0, i),
        v = i < 0 ? 'True' : t.substring(i + 1);
        if (p.toLowerCase() == k.toLowerCase()) {
        return v;
      }
    }
      return '';
  };
  uol_sc.getValOnce = function (v, c, e, t) {
    var a = new Date(),
      i = t == 'm' ? 60000 : 86400000;
      v = v ? v : '';
    e = e ? e : 0;
    c = c ? c : 's_gvo';
      var k = uol_sc.c_r(c);
      if (v) {
      a.setTime(a.getTime() + e * i);
      uol_sc.c_w(c, v, e === 0 ? 0 : a);
    }
      return v == k ? '' : v;
  };
  uol_sc.apl = function (L, v, d, u) {
    var m = 0;
      if (!L) {
      L = '';
    }
    if (u) {
      var i, n, a = uol_sc.split(L,d);
      for (i = 0; i < a.length; i++) {
        n = a[i];
        m = m || (u == 1 ? (n == v) : (n.toLowerCase() == v.toLowerCase()));
      }
    }
    if (!m) {
      L = L ? L + d + v : v;
    }
      return L;
  };
  uol_sc.split = function (l, d) {
    var i,
      x = 0,
      a = [];
      while (l) {
      i = l.indexOf(d);
      i = i > -1 ? i : l.length;
      a[x++] = l.substring(0, i);
      l = l.substring(i + d.length);
    }
      return a;
  };
  uol_sc.linkHandler = function (p, t) {
    var h = uol_sc.p_gh(),
      i, l;
      t = t ? t : 'o';
      if (!h || (uol_sc.linkType && (h || uol_sc.linkName))) {
      return '';
    }
      i = h.indexOf('?');
    h = uol_sc.linkLeaveQueryString || i < 0 ? h : h.substring(0, i);
    l = uol_sc.pt(p, '|', 'p_gn', h.toLowerCase());
      if (l) {
      uol_sc.linkName = l == '[[' ? '' : l;
      uol_sc.linkType = t;
      return h;
    }
      return '';
  };
  uol_sc.p_gn = function (t, h) {
    var i = t ? t.indexOf('~') : -1,
      n, x;
      if (t && h) {
      n = i < 0 ? '' : t.substring(0, i);
      x = t.substring(i + 1);
        if (h.indexOf(x.toLowerCase()) >- 1) {
        return n ? n : '[[';
      }
    }
      return 0;
  };
  uol_sc.p_gh = function () {
    if (!uol_sc.eo && !uol_sc.lnk) {
      return '';
    }
      var o = uol_sc.eo ? uol_sc.eo : uol_sc.lnk,
      y = uol_sc.ot(o),
      n = uol_sc.oid(o),
      x = o.s_oidt;
      if (uol_sc.eo && o == uol_sc.eo) {
      while (o && !n && y != 'BODY') {
        o = o.parentElement? o.parentElement : o.parentNode;
          if (!o) {
          return '';
        }
          y = uol_sc.ot(o);
        n = uol_sc.oid(o);
        x = o.s_oidt;
      }
    }
      return o.href ? o.href : '';
  };
  uol_sc.getVisitStart = function (c) {
    var v = 1,
      t = new Date();
      t.setTime(t.getTime() + 1800000);
      if (uol_sc.c_r(c)) {
      v = 0;
    }
    if (!uol_sc.c_w(c, 1, t)) {
      uol_sc.c_w(c, 1, 0);
    }
    if (!uol_sc.c_r(c)) {
      v = 0;
    }
      return v;
  };
  uol_sc.cleanGP = function () {
    var a = document.referrer,
      b = 'plus.url.google.com',
      i = 0,
      c, d, e, g, p;
    if (a && a.split('/')[2] == b) {
      c = a.split(/[\?|&]/);
      d = c[0].length;
      e = c[0].lastIndexOf('/');
      g = d > e ? c[0].substring(0, e + 1) : c[0];
        for (i = 0; i <= c.length; i++) {
        if ('url' == c[i].substring(0, 3)) {
          p = '?' + unescape(c[i]);
          break;
        }
      }
      if (g) {
        uol_sc.referrer = p ? g + p : g;
      }
    }
      return uol_sc.referrer;
  }();
  uol_sc.getFullReferringDomains = function (referrer) {
    var dr = referrer || window.document.referrer,
      n = uol_sc.linkInternalFilters.split(',');
      if (dr) {
      var r = dr.split('/')[2],
        l = n.length;
        if (r) {
        if (r.match(/www/)) {
          var d = r.split('.'),
            e = (d[0].length) + 1;
          r = r.substring(e, r.length);
        }
          for (var i = 0; i <= l; i++) {
          if (r.indexOf(n[i]) != -1) {
            r = '';
            i = l + 1;
          }
        }
          return r;
      }
    }
  };
  uol_sc.getPercentPageViewed = function() {
    if (typeof uol_sc.linkType === 'undefined' || uol_sc.linkType == 'e') {
      var v = [uol_sc.c_r('s_ppv'), uol_sc.c_r('s_ppvn')];
      return v;
    }
  };
  uol_sc.getPPVCalc = function () {
    var dd = uol_sc.d.documentElement,
      dh = Math.max(Math.max(uol_sc.d.body.scrollHeight, dd.scrollHeight), Math.max(uol_sc.d.body.offsetHeight, dd.offsetHeight), Math.max(uol_sc.d.body.clientHeight, dd.clientHeight)),
      vph = uol_sc.d.clientHeight || Math.min(dd.clientHeight, uol_sc.d.body.clientHeight),
      st = uol_sc.wd.pageYOffset || (uol_sc.wd.document.documentElement.scrollTop || uol_sc.wd.document.body.scrollTop),
      vh = st + vph,
      pv = Math.round(vh / dh * 100),
      cv = uol_sc.c_r('s_ppv'),
      cvn = uol_sc.c_r('s_ppvn'),
      cpi = cv.indexOf('|'),
      cpin = cvn.indexOf('|'),
      cpv, cpvn, ps, psn;
      if (cpi !== -1) {
      cpv = cv.substring(0, cpi);
      ps = parseInt(cv.substring(cpi + 1));
    } else if (cpin !== -1) {
      cpvn = cvn.substring(0, cpin);
      psn = parseInt(cvn.substring(cpin + 1));
    } else {
      cpv = ps = 0;
      cpvn = psn = 0;
    }
      if (pv <= 100) {
      psn = pv - Math.round(vph / dh * 100);
      uol_sc.c_w('s_ppvn', pv + '|' + psn);
        if ( pv > parseInt(cpv)) {
        ps = pv - Math.round(vph / dh * 100);
        uol_sc.c_w('s_ppv', pv + '|' + ps);
      } else if (pv >= parseInt(cpvn)) {
        uol_sc.c_w('s_ppv', pv + '|' + psn);
      }
    } else {
      uol_sc.c_w('s_ppv', '');
    }
  };
  uol_sc.getPPVSetup = function () {
    var events = new Events();
      events.addEvent(window, 'load', uol_sc.getPPVCalc, false);
    events.addEvent(window, 'scroll', uol_sc.getPPVCalc, false);
    events.addEvent(window, 'resize', uol_sc.getPPVCalc, false);
    events.addEvent(window, 'beforeunload', UOLPD.Audience.clearPPVN, false);
  };
  uol_sc.getPreviousValue = function (v, c, el) {
    var t = new Date(),
      i, j,
      r = '';
      v = v || 'no value';
    t.setTime(t.getTime() + 1800000);
      if (el) {
      if (uol_sc.events) {
        i = uol_sc.split(el, ',');
        j = uol_sc.split(uol_sc.events, ',');
          for (var x in i) {
          for (var y in j) {
            if (i[x] == j[y]) {
              if (uol_sc.c_r(c)) {
                r = uol_sc.c_r(c);
              }
              uol_sc.c_w(c, v, t);
                return r;
            }
          }
        }
      }
    } else {
      if (uol_sc.c_r(c)) {
        r = uol_sc.c_r(c);
      }
      uol_sc.c_w(c, v, t);
        return r;
    }
  };
  function TypeValidator () {
    var $public = this,
      $private = {};
        $public.isDefined = function (value) {
      return value !== undefined && value !== null;
    };
      $public.isString = function (value) {
      return value !== undefined && (typeof value) === 'string' && ($private.stringIsNotEmpty(value));
    };
      $private.stringIsNotEmpty = function (string) {
      return ($private.trimString(string).length > 0);
    };
      $private.trimString = function (string) {
      return string.replace(/^(\s+)|(\s+)$/gm, '').replace(/\s+/gm, ' ');
    };
      $public.isArray = function (value) {
      return value && value.constructor === Array;
    };
      $public.arrayIsNotEmpty = function (value) {
      return $public.isArray(value) && value.length > 0;
    };
      $public.isObject = function (entity) {
      return entity && entity.constructor === Object;
    };
      $public.isFunction = function (value) {
      return value !== undefined && value.constructor === Function;
    };
      $public.isNumber = function (value) {
      return Number(value) === value;
    };
      $public.isInt = function (value) {
      return $public.isNumber(value) && value % 1 === 0;
    };
      $public.isRegExp = function (value) {
      return value !== undefined && value.constructor === RegExp;
    };
      $public.isNumericString = function (value) {
      return $public.isString(value) && !isNaN(value);
    };
      $public.isBoolean = function (value) {
      return value !== undefined && value.constructor == Boolean;
    };
      $public.isJson = function (value) {
        try {
        value = JSON.parse(value);
      } catch (e) {
        return false;
      }
        if (typeof value === 'object' && value !== null) {
        return true;
      }
        return false;
    };
      $public.isUrl = function (value) {
      return value.match(/(http|https):\/\/(\w+:{0,1}\w*)?(\S+)(:[0-9]+)?(\/|\/([\w#!:.?+=&%!\-\/]))?/ig);
    };
      return $public;
  }
    function Utils () {
    var $public = this,
      $private = {};
      $private.typeValidator = new TypeValidator();
      $public.setVar = function (key, value) {
      try {
        uol_sc[key] = value;
      } catch (e) {
        throw 'Can not set the value: ' + value + ' on key: ' + key + ' of uol_sc object.';
      }
    };
      $public.setVars = function (vars, value, defaultValue, notReplaceStress) {
      if (!notReplaceStress) {
        value = $public.replaceStress(value);
      }
        value = value ? value : defaultValue;
        if ($private.typeValidator.isArray(vars)) {
        for (var i = vars.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
          $public.setVar(vars[i], value);
        }
      } else if ($private.typeValidator.isString(vars)) {
        $public.setVar(vars, value);
      }
    };
      $public.addInVar = function (key, value, index, delimiter) {
      index = (index === null || index === undefined) ? 2 : index;
      delimiter = delimiter || ',';
        var newValue = uol_sc[key],
        arr = newValue.split(delimiter);
        if (index == 'a' || index >= arr.length) {
        newValue += delimiter + value;
      } else {
        for (var i = arr.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
          if (i == index) {
            arr[i] = value + delimiter + arr[i];
          }
        }
          newValue = arr.join(delimiter);
      }
        uol_sc[key] = newValue;
    };
      $public.clearVars = function (vars) {
      var events, i;
        if ($private.typeValidator.isArray(vars)) {
        for (i = vars.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
          clearVar(vars[i]);
        }
      } else {
        clearVar(vars);
      }
        function clearVar (str) {
        if (str.match(/event/g) && uol_sc.events) {
          events = uol_sc.events;
          events = events.replace(str, '');
          events = events.replace(/\,\,/, ',');
          events = events.replace(/^,|\,$/g, '');
          uol_sc.events = events;
        } else {
          uol_sc[str] = '';
        }
      }
    };
      $public.utf8Encode = function (strUni) {
      var cc, strUtf;
            strUtf = strUni.replace(/[\u0080-\u07ff]/g, function (c) {
        cc = c.charCodeAt(0);
        return String.fromCharCode(0xc0 | cc>>6, 0x80 | cc&0x3f);
      });
        strUtf = strUtf.replace(/[\u0800-\uffff]/g, function (c) {
        cc = c.charCodeAt(0);
        return String.fromCharCode(0xe0 | cc>>12, 0x80 | cc>>6&0x3F, 0x80 | cc&0x3f);
      });
        return strUtf;
    };
      $public.replaceStress = function (str) {
      var s = !str ? ' ' : str,
        regExps = [
          /((ã|á|à|â|ä)|&a(acute|grave|circ|tilde|uml);|&#(192|193|194|195|196|197|198|224|225|226|227|228|229|230|256);)/g,
          /(&(#66|#98);)/g,
          /((é|è|ê|ë)|&e(acute|grave|circ|tilde|uml|th);|&#(201|233|200|232|202|234|203|235);)/g,
          /((í|ì|î|ï)|&i(acute|grave|circ|tilde|uml);|&#(204|205|206|207|236|237|238|239);)/g,
          /((õ|ó|ò|ô|ö)|&o(acute|grave|circ|tilde|uml|slash);|&#(210|211|212|213|214|242|243|244|245|246);)/g,
          /((ú|ù|û|ü)|&u(acute|grave|circ|tilde|uml);|&#(218|250|217|249|219|251|220|252);)/g,
          /((ñ)|&ntilde;|&#(241);)/g,
          /((ç)|&ccedil;|&(#231);)/g,
          /((ý|ÿ)|&yacute;|&#(253|255);)/g,
          /(Ð|"|"'|º|&(ordm|ETH);|&#(34|35|039|39|45|58);)/g,
          /(s?:s?|º| - |-||=|&(ordm|ETH);|&#(42|44|47|60|61|62|91|92|93|94|95|96|123|124|125|126|161|162|163|164|165|166|167|168|169|170|171|172|174|175|176|177|178|179|180|181|182|183|184|185|186|187|188|189|190|191|208|215|216|222|223|240|248|254);)/g
        ],
        replaces = ['a', 'b', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u', 'n', 'c', 'y', '', ' '],
        i, j;
        if ($private.typeValidator.isArray(s) && s.length > 0) {
        for (j = 0; j < s.length; j++) {
          s[j] = '' + s[j];
          s[j] = s[j].toLowerCase();
          s[j] = UOLPD.Audience.replaceStressISO ? $public.utf8Encode(s[j]) : s[j];
            for (i = 0; i < regExps.length; i++) {
            if (s[j].match(regExps[i])) {
              s[j] = s[j].replace(regExps[i], replaces[i]);
            }
          }
        }
      } else {
        s = '' + s;
        s = s.toLowerCase();
        s = UOLPD.Audience.replaceStressISO ? $public.utf8Encode(s) : s;
          for (i = 0; i < regExps.length; i++) {
          if (s.match(regExps[i])) {
            s = s.replace(regExps[i], replaces[i]);
          }
        }
      }
        return (s == ' ' ? '' : s);
    };
      return $public;
  }
  function Events () {
    var $public = this,
      $private = {};
      $public.addEvent = function (obj, evt, listener, useCapture) {
      useCapture = useCapture || false;
            if (obj.addEventListener) {
        obj.addEventListener(evt, listener, useCapture);
        return listener;
      } else if (obj.attachEvent) {
        obj.attachEvent('on' + evt, listener);
        return true;
      } else {
        obj['on' + evt] = listener;
        return true;
      }
    };
    $public.removeEvent = function (obj, evt, listener, useCapture) {
      useCapture = useCapture || false;
            if (obj.removeEventListener) {
        obj.removeEventListener(evt, listener, useCapture);
      } else if (obj.detachEvent) {
        obj.detachEvent('on' + evt, listener);
      }
    };
      $public.fireEvents = function (obj, evt) {
      var event = $private.createEventToFire(evt);
        if (document.dispatchEvent) {
        return !obj.dispatchEvent(event);
      } else if (document.fireEvent) {
        return obj.fireEvent ('on' + evt, event);
      }
    };
      $private.createEventToFire = function (evt) {
      var event;
      if ('createEvent' in document) {
        try {
          event = new Event(evt);
        } catch (e) {
          event = document.createEvent('Events');
            event.initEvent(evt, true, true);
        }
      } else {
        event = document.createEventObject();
        event.synthetic = true;
      }
        return event;
    };
      return $public;
  }
    window.UOLPD = window.UOLPD || {};
    var Player;
    if (window.UOLPD.Audience) {
    if (window.UOLPD.Audience.Player) { Player = window.UOLPD.Audience.Player; }
  }
    window.UOLPD.Audience = new Audience();
    if (Player) { window.UOLPD.Audience.Player = Player; }
    function Audience () {
    var $public = this,
      $private = {};
      $public.removesIndexOf = ['file://'];
    $private.removesRegExp = [];
    $private.utils = new Utils();
      $public.countMetrics = function () {
      $public.beforeHit();
        if (!$private.removeRequest()) {
        uol_sc.t();
      }
        $public.afterHit();
    };
      $public.countMedia = function (id, type) {
      $public.beforeHit();
        if (id && type) {
        uol_sc.prop5 = $private.utils.replaceStress(id);
        uol_sc.prop4 = $private.utils.replaceStress(type);
        uol_sc.t();
      }
    };
      $public.addRemoveRequest = function (pattern, flags) {
      if (flags || flags === '') {
        $private.removesRegExp.push({ pattern: pattern, flags: flags });
      } else {
        $public.removesIndexOf.push(pattern);
      }
    };
      $private.removeRequest = function () {
      var removes = $public.removesIndexOf,
        url = window.location.href,
        i, remove;
        for (i = removes.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        if (url.indexOf(removes[i]) > -1) {
          return true;
        }
      }
        removes = $private.removesRegExp;
            for (i = removes.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        remove = new RegExp(removes[i].pattern, removes[i].flags);
          if (url.match(remove)) {
          return true;
        }
      }
        return false;
    };
      $public.getUolSc = function () {
      return uol_sc;
    };
    $public.beforeHit = function () {};
    $public.afterHit = function () {};
      return $public;
  }
  window.hitOmniturePhoto = function (mediaId) {
    UOLPD.Audience.countMedia(mediaId, 'fotos');
    void 0;
  };
  window.hitOmniture = function (titleId, tipo) {
    UOLPD.Audience.countMedia(titleId, tipo);
    void 0;
  };
    function Storage () {
    var $public = this,
      $private = {};
      $private.typeValidator = new TypeValidator();
    $private.hasLocalStorage = window.localStorage ? true : false;
      $public.get = function (key) {
      var value;
        if ($private.hasLocalStorage) {
        value = localStorage.getItem(key);
      }
      if (!$private.hasLocalStorage || !value) {
        value = uol_sc.c_r(key);
      }
      if ($private.typeValidator.isJson(value)) {
        value = JSON.parse(value);
      }
        return value || '';
    };
      $public.set = function (key, value) {
      if ($private.hasLocalStorage) {
        localStorage.setItem(key, value);
      } else {
        uol_sc.c_w(key, value);
      }
    };
      $public.remove = function (key) {
      if ($private.hasLocalStorage) {
        localStorage.removeItem(key);
      }
      uol_sc.c_w(key, '');
    };
      return $public;
  }
    function DoPlugins (settings) {
    var $public = this,
      $private = {};
      $public.settings = settings || {};
    $private.storage = new Storage();
      $public.init = function () {
      if ($public.clickUol()) return;
        $public.timeParting();
      $public.url();
      $public.externalCampaignTracking();
      $public.pageViewEvent();
      $public.productsAndLoginType();
      $public.entryPage();
      $public.account();
      $public.referringFullDomains();
        if ($public.settings.hasOwnProperty('internalSearch')) {
        $public.internalSearch($public.settings.internalSearch);
      }
        if ($public.settings.hasOwnProperty('internalSearchFriendly')) {
        $public.internalSearchFriendly($public.settings.internalSearchFriendly);
      }
    };
      $public.timeParting = function () {
      uol_sc.prop7 = uol_sc.TimeParting('h', '-3');
      uol_sc.prop8 = uol_sc.TimeParting('d', '-3');
      uol_sc.prop9 = uol_sc.TimeParting('w', '-3');
    };
      $public.url = function () {
      uol_sc.prop50 = uol_sc.pageURL = window.location.href;
    };
      $public.externalCampaignTracking = function () {
      if (!uol_sc.campaign) {
        uol_sc.campaign = uol_sc.getValOnce(uol_sc.getQueryParam('cmpid').replace(/\#.*/g, ''), 's_campaign', 0);
      }
    };
      $public.pageViewEvent = function () {
      uol_sc.events = uol_sc.apl(uol_sc.events, 'event1', ',', 2);
    };
      $public.clickUol = function () {
      uol_sc.linkLeaveQueryString = true;
        var click_url = uol_sc.linkHandler('click.uol~click.uol.com.br', 'e'),
        result = false;
        if (click_url) {
        var destiny = uol_sc.getQueryParam('u', '', click_url);
          if (destiny.match(/http\:\/\/clicklogger.rm/) && click_url.match(/redir/)) {
          destiny = uol_sc.getQueryParam('redir', '', click_url);
        }
          uol_sc.eVar44 = uol_sc.linkName = destiny;
        uol_sc.linkType = uol_sc.lt(destiny || '') || 'o';
          uol_sc.eVar42 = uol_sc.getQueryParam('rf', '', click_url);
        uol_sc.eVar15 = uol_sc.pageName || window.location.href;
          uol_sc.events = uol_sc.apl(uol_sc.events, 'event15', ',', 2);
        uol_sc.linkTrackVars = 'eVar44,eVar42,eVar15,events';
        uol_sc.linkTrackEvents = 'event15';
          result = true;
      }
        uol_sc.linkLeaveQueryString = false;
        return result;
    };
      $public.productsAndLoginType = function () {
      var value = uol_sc.c_r('UPL09');
      var products, types, type;
        if (value) {
        $private.storage.set('UPL09', value);
      } else {
        value = $private.storage.get('UPL09');
      }
        if (value) {
        value = value.split('-');
          products = value[1].replace(/\|/g, ',');
          types = [null, 'UOL', 'BOL', 'outros dominios', 'UOL argentina', 'metade ideal', 'Folha', 'Zipmail', 'UOL mexico', 'UOL venezuela', 'UOL catalunia', 'UOL inc.'];
        type = types[value[0]];
      }
        uol_sc.prop13 = products || 'sem cadastro';
      uol_sc.prop74 = type || 'nao identificado';
    };
      $public.entryPage = function () {
      if (uol_sc.getVisitStart('s_visit') == 1) {
        uol_sc.prop48 = uol_sc.pageName || window.location.href;
      }
    };
      $public.account = function () {
      var value = uol_sc.c_r('UOL_ID');
        if (value) {
        $private.storage.set('UOL_ID', value);
      } else {
        value = $private.storage.get('UOL_ID');
      }
        if (value) {
        value = value.split('||');
        uol_sc.prop38 = value[1];
      }
    };
      $public.referringFullDomains = function () {
      uol_sc.eVar23 = uol_sc.getFullReferringDomains();
    };
    $public.internalSearch = function (queryString) {
      var termSearch = decodeURIComponent(uol_sc.getQueryParam(queryString)).replace(/\+/g,' ').toLowerCase(),
        trueTest = new RegExp(queryString + '=(t|T)rue', 'g');
        if (termSearch === 'true' && !trueTest.test(window.location.href)) {
        termSearch = '';
      }
        if (termSearch && !termSearch.match(/^cache\:/)) {
        uol_sc.prop12 = uol_sc.eVar12 = termSearch;
          if (uol_sc.getValOnce(termSearch, 'ev5', 0)) {
          uol_sc.events = uol_sc.apl(uol_sc.events, 'event5', ',', 2);
        }
      }
    };
    $public.internalSearchFriendly = function (queryString) {
      var termSearch = decodeURIComponent(window.location.href).replace(/\+/g,' ');
        if (termSearch.indexOf(queryString) > -1) {
        termSearch = termSearch.split(queryString);
        termSearch = termSearch[1].split('/');
        termSearch = termSearch[0].replace(/\//g, '');
        termSearch = termSearch.toLowerCase();
          if (termSearch && !termSearch.match(/^cache\:/)) {
          uol_sc.prop12 = uol_sc.eVar12 = termSearch;
            if (uol_sc.getValOnce(termSearch, 'ev5', 0)) {
            uol_sc.events = uol_sc.apl(uol_sc.events, 'event5', ',', 2);
          }
        }
      }
    };
      return $public;
  }
    function Scroll () {
    var $public = this,
      $private = {};
      $private.utils = new Utils();
    $private.typeValidator = new TypeValidator();
    uol_sc.getPPVSetup();
      UOLPD.Audience.execScroll = function () {
      uol_sc.previousValue = uol_sc.getPreviousValue('pageName', 'gpv_pn');
      if (uol_sc.previousValue) {
        $public.getScrollPage();
      }
    };
      UOLPD.Audience.clearPPVN = function () {
      uol_sc.c_w('s_ppvn', '-1');
    };
      $public.getScrollPage = function () {
      var gp = uol_sc.getPercentPageViewed();
        if (!$private.typeValidator.isDefined(gp)) {
        gp = [uol_sc.c_r('s_ppv'), uol_sc.c_r('s_ppvn')];
        uol_sc.c_w('s_ppvn', 0);
        uol_sc.c_w('s_ppv', 0);
      }
        var omtrMasterNow = $private.typeValidator.isDefined(gp) && gp !== '' && gp[1] !== '0' && gp[1] !== '' ? gp[1] : '2|1',
        omtrMaster = $private.typeValidator.isDefined(gp) && gp !== '' && gp[0] !== '0' && gp[0] !== '' ? gp[0] : '2|1',
        omtrScrollText = ['ate 10%', 'ate 10%', 'de 11% a 20%', '21% a 30', 'de 31% a 40%', 'de 41% a 50%', 'de 51% a 60%', 'de 61% a 70%', 'de 71% a 80%', 'de 81% a 90%', 'de 91% a 100%'];
      omtrMasterNow = omtrMasterNow.split('|');
      omtrMaster = omtrMaster.split('|');
        if (omtrMaster) {
        var matVisuPage = Math.ceil(omtrMaster[0] / 10),
          matVisuPageNow = omtrMasterNow[0] !== '-1' ? Math.ceil(omtrMasterNow[0] / 10) : '',
          matVisuScroll = Math.ceil(omtrMaster[1] / 10),
          matNotScroll = Math.ceil((omtrMaster[0] - omtrMaster[1]) / 10);
          uol_sc.prop19 = omtrScrollText[matVisuPage] + ' de visualizacao da pagina';
          uol_sc.prop36 = omtrScrollText[matNotScroll] + ' de visualizacao sem scroll';
          uol_sc.prop20 = omtrScrollText[matVisuScroll] + ' de scroll';
            if (matVisuPageNow) {
            uol_sc.prop10 = omtrScrollText[matVisuPageNow] + ' de visualizacao da pagina no clique';
          }
      }
    };
      return $public;
  }
  uol_sc.getLoadTime = function() {
      if (!window.s_loadT) {
      var b = new Date().getTime(),
        o = window.performance ? performance.timing : 0,
        a = o ? o.requestStart : window.inHeadTS || 0;
        window.s_loadT = a ? Math.round((b - a) / 100) : '';
    }
      return s_loadT;
  };
    function LoadTime () {
    var $public = this,
      $private = {};
      $private.typeValidator = new TypeValidator();
      $public.getLoadTime = function () {
      if ($private.typeValidator.isDefined(window.inHeadTS)) {
        return uol_sc.getLoadTime();
      }
    };
      return $public;
  }
    function HomeComponent () {
    var $public = this,
      $private = {};
      $private.typeValidator = new TypeValidator();
    $private.utils = new Utils();
    $private.scroll = new Scroll();
    $private.loadTime = new LoadTime();
      $public.settings = {
      components: {
        keys: 'prop68',
        event: 'event31',
        notReplaceStress: true
      },
      abTest: {
        keys: ['prop42', 'eVar39'],
        event: 'event6',
        defaultValue: (typeof tailtargetInterestCars !== 'undefined' && tailtargetInterestCars ? tailtargetInterestCars : 'desligado'),
        notReplaceStress: true
      }
    };
      $public.init = function () {
      uol_sc.pageName = "uol homepage";
        uol_sc.prop1 = $private.loadTime.getLoadTime();
      $private.isWindowActive();
      UOLPD.Audience.execScroll();
      $private.debugTracking();
      $private.setUniversalVariableValues();
    };
      $public.clickUol = function () {
      if (!metricOff) {
        uol_sc.linkLeaveQueryString = true;
          var click_url = uol_sc.linkHandler('click.uol~click.uol.com.br', 'e'),
          result = false;
          if (click_url) {
          var reference = uol_sc.getQueryParam('rf', '', click_url),
            destiny = uol_sc.getQueryParam('u', '', click_url),
            pos = uol_sc.getQueryParam('pos', '', click_url).split(';'),
            position = ($private.typeValidator.isArray(pos) && pos.length < 3 ? pos[0] : pos.slice(0, 2).join('-')) || 'sem posicao',
            theme = pos[2] || pos[1] || 'nao localizado';
            if (destiny.match(/http\:\/\/clicklogger.rm/) && click_url.match(/redir/)) {
            destiny = uol_sc.getQueryParam('redir', '', click_url);
          }
          uol_sc.prop45 = reference;
          uol_sc.prop46 = uol_sc.eVar44 = uol_sc.linkName = destiny;
          uol_sc.prop18 = destiny.replace(/.*\/\/|\/.*|\?.*/g, '');
          uol_sc.prop67 = position;
          uol_sc.prop68 = theme;
            UOLPD.Audience.execScroll();
            uol_sc.events = uol_sc.apl(uol_sc.events, 'event15', ',', 2);
          uol_sc.linkTrackVars = 'prop10,prop19,prop20,prop36,prop45,prop46,prop18,prop67,prop68,eVar44,events';
          uol_sc.linkTrackEvents = 'event15';
            if (!reference) {
            $public.disableMetrics();
          }
            result = true;
        }
          uol_sc.linkLeaveQueryString = false;
          return result;
      }
    };
      $public.clickComponent = function (obj) {
      if ($private.typeValidator.isDefined(obj)) {
        if ($private.typeValidator.isDefined(obj.nodeName) && obj.nodeName) {
          var reference = obj.href;
          obj.action = uol_sc.getQueryParam("u", "", reference);
          obj.mod = uol_sc.getQueryParam("pos", "", reference).split(";");
          obj.ref = obj.getAttribute("name");
        }
          var mod = $private.typeValidator.isArray(obj.mod) ? obj.mod : obj.mod.split(";"),
          position = ($private.typeValidator.isArray(mod) && mod.length < 3 ? mod[0] : mod.slice(0, 2).join("-")) || "nao localizado",
          theme = mod[2] || mod[1] || "nao localizado";
          if (obj.formName) {
          var form = obj.formName.replace(/\s/g, '_').toLowerCase();
            uol_sc.prop14 = obj.query.toLowerCase() || 'busca vazia';
          uol_sc.prop45 = 'homec-' + form;
          uol_sc.prop46 = uol_sc.eVar44 = form;
          uol_sc.prop67 = position;
          uol_sc.prop68 = theme;
            UOLPD.Audience.execScroll();
            uol_sc.events = 'event15,event16';
          uol_sc.linkTrackVars = 'prop10,prop14,prop19,prop20,prop36,prop45,prop46,prop67,prop68,eVar44,events';
          uol_sc.linkTrackEvents = 'event15,event16';
          uol_sc.tl('form busca', 'o', form);
            uol_sc.abort = true;
            $private.utils.clearVars(['prop10', 'prop14', 'prop19', 'prop20', 'prop36', 'prop45', 'prop46', 'prop67', 'prop68', 'eVar44', 'event15', 'event16']);
        } else {
          if (obj.ref) {
            var ref = obj.ref.replace(/\s/g, "_").toLowerCase(),
              abTest = obj.abTest || '';
            uol_sc.prop46 = uol_sc.eVar44 = obj.action.replace(/\s/g, "_").toLowerCase();
            uol_sc.prop45 = "homec-" + ref;
            uol_sc.prop67 = position;
            uol_sc.prop68 = theme;
              uol_sc.prop42 = uol_sc.eVar39 = abTest;
              UOLPD.Audience.execScroll();
              uol_sc.events = uol_sc.apl(uol_sc.events, 'event15', ',', 2);
            uol_sc.linkTrackVars = "prop10,prop19,prop20,prop36,prop42,prop45,prop46,prop67,prop68,eVar39,eVar44,events";
            uol_sc.linkTrackEvents = 'event15';
            uol_sc.tl('clique botao', 'o', uol_sc.eVar44);
                        uol_sc.getPPVCalc();
              $private.utils.clearVars(['prop10', 'prop19', 'prop20', 'prop36', 'prop42', 'prop45', 'prop46', 'prop67', 'prop68', 'eVar39', 'eVar44', 'event15']);
        } }
      }
    };
      $public.countClick = function (obj) {
      var action = obj.action || obj.destiny || 'clique',
        reference = obj.reference || 'sem referencia',
        position = obj.position || 'sem posicao',
        theme = obj.theme || 'sem tema',
        source = obj.source || window.location.href;
        if ($private.typeValidator.isUrl(action)) {
        uol_sc.eVar44 = uol_sc.linkName = action;
        uol_sc.eVar45 = action.replace(/.*\/\/|\/.*|\?.*/g, '');
      } else {
        uol_sc.eVar44 = uol_sc.eVar45 = action;
      }
        uol_sc.eVar15 = source;
      uol_sc.eVar42 = reference;
      uol_sc.eVar67 = position;
      uol_sc.list1 = theme;
        uol_sc.events = uol_sc.apl(uol_sc.events, 'event15', ',', 2);
        uol_sc.linkTrackVars = 'eVar15,eVar42,eVar44,eVar45,eVar67,list1,events';
      uol_sc.linkTrackEvents = 'event15';
      uol_sc.tl(true, 'o', 'Clique em Componente');
    };
      $public.countImpression = function (obj) {
      uol_sc.prop68 = obj.components;
      uol_sc.events = 'event31';
      uol_sc.linkTrackVars = 'prop68,events';
      uol_sc.linkTrackEvents = 'event31';
      uol_sc.tl(true, 'o', 'Impressao');
      $private.utils.clearVars(['prop68', 'event31']);
    };
      $public.errorPage = function () {
      var sRef = document.referrer;
        if (/#404/.test(location.hash) === true && (!sRef.match(/superfish\.com/)) ) {
        uol_sc.un = 'uolreport20';
        uol_sc.channel = 'Pagina de erro';
        uol_sc.referrer = document.referrer;
        uol_sc.prop12 = uol_sc.eVar12 = uol_sc.getQueryParam('q');
        uol_sc.pageName = window.location;
          $private.utils.clearVars(['prop66', 'prop73', 'prop10', 'prop19', 'prop20', 'prop36']);
        uol_sc.t();
          uol_sc.prop12 = uol_sc.eVar12 = '';
        uol_sc.channel = uol_sc.eVar49 = 'Home';
        uol_sc.pageName = 'uol homepage';
        uol_sc.un = 'uoluolprod';
          return true;
      }
        return false;
    };
      $public.disableMetrics = function () {
      UOLPD.Audience.execScroll();
        uol_sc.linkName = '';
      uol_sc.linkType = '';
      uol_sc.trackExternalLinks = false;
    };
      $public.removeRequest = function () {
      var url = window.location.href,
        ref = document.referrer.replace(/http:\/\/|\//g, '');
        return url.match(/(?:file\:\/\/|walkingdeadbr\.com|holyfool\.zip\.net)/) || ref.match(/walkingdeadbr\.com|blog\.clickgratis\.com\.br|hospedeiros\.com|textos\_legais\.sites\.uol\.com\.br|uol\.com\.brhtmlguihtmlwelcomeSplashwelcome\_splash\.html|b\.cheapstuff\.com|b\.cured\.com|ib\.adnxs\.com|superfish\.com/) ? true : false;
    };
      $private.getUniversalVariableValues = function (index) {
      return (window.universal_variable && window.universal_variable.sc && window.universal_variable.sc[index]) ? window.universal_variable.sc[index] : '';
    };
      $private.setUniversalVariableValues = function () {
      var obj = $public.settings,
        i, value;
        for (i in obj) {
        value = $private.getUniversalVariableValues(i);
          if (obj[i].hasOwnProperty('event') && value) {
          uol_sc.events = uol_sc.apl(uol_sc.events, obj[i].event, ',', 2);
        }
          if (obj[i].hasOwnProperty('fromTo') && obj[i].fromTo[value]) {
          value = obj[i].fromTo[value];
        }
          $private.utils.setVars(obj[i].keys, value, obj[i].defaultValue, obj[i].notReplaceStress);
      }
    };
      $private.debugTracking = function () {
      uol_sc.debugTracking = document.location.href.match(/\?debug\=true$/) ? true : false;
    };
      $private.isWindowActive = function () {
      uol_sc.prop66 = document.hasFocus() ? 'ativa' : 'inativa';
    };
      return $public;
  }
    function AdBlocker () {
    var $public = this,
      $private = {};
      $private.storage = new Storage();
    $private.rsid = 'uoluolprod';
    $private.key = 'adblocker';
      $public.init = function () {
      var adblocker = $private.storage.get($private.key).toString();
        if (adblocker == '1') {
        uol_sc.prop73 = 'blocked';
      } else if (adblocker == '0') {
        uol_sc.prop73 = 'not_blocked';
      }
    };
      $public.adblockerModal = function () {
      uol_sc.prop73 = 'modal_adblocker';
      uol_sc.linkTrackVars = 'prop73';
      uol_sc.tl(true, 'o', 'AdBlocker');
    };
      $public.requestBlocked = function (value) {
      value = value || 'blocked';
        var newImg = document.createElement('img');
        newImg.id = 'newImgSplunk';
        newImg.src = 'https://logger.rm.uol.com.br/v1/?prd=900&grp=rsid:' + $private.rsid + ';prop73:' + value + ';&msr=Erros:1';
        newImg.style.width = 0;
        newImg.style.height = 0;
        newImg.style.display = 'none';
        document.body.appendChild(newImg);
        $private.storage.remove($private.key);
    };
      return $public;
  }
  function CountOnceComponent () {
    var $public = this,
      $private = {};
      $private.components = {};
      $public.init = function () {
      var component, index;
        for (var i = arguments.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        component = arguments[i];
          if (!$private.components.hasOwnProperty(component)) {
          $private.components[component] = 0;
        }
          if (uol_sc.list1) {
          index = uol_sc.list1.indexOf(component);
            if (index >= 0) {
            $private.components[component]++;
              if ($private.components[component] > 1) {
              uol_sc.list1.splice(index, 1);
              uol_sc.prop14.splice(index, 1);
            }
          }
        }
      }
    };
      return $public;
  }
    function TailTarget () {
    var $public = this,
      $private = {};
      $private.utils = new Utils();
    $private.storage = new Storage();
      $public.settings = {
      tt_age: {
        vars: 'prop26'
      },
      tt_gender: {
        vars: 'prop27'
      },
      tt_socialclass: {
        vars: 'prop28'
      },
      tt_cluster: {
        vars: 'prop29'
      },
      tt_customaudience: {
        vars: 'prop30'
      }
    };
      $private.getValue = function (index) {
      if ($private.tailTargetVariable && $private.tailTargetVariable[index]) {
        return $private.tailTargetVariable[index];
      } else if ($private.tailTargetStorage && $private.tailTargetStorage.TailtargetTrack && $private.tailTargetStorage.TailtargetTrack[index]) {
        return $private.tailTargetStorage.TailtargetTrack[index];
      }
    };
      $public.init = function () {
      $private.tailTargetVariable = window.UOLPD.dataLayer || {};
      $private.tailTargetStorage = $private.storage.get('uolDataLayer') || {};
        var obj = $public.settings,
        i;
        for (i in obj) {
        $private.utils.setVars(obj[i].vars, $private.getValue(i), obj[i].defaultValue, obj[i].notReplaceStress);
      }
    };
  }
  var utils = new Utils(),
    doPlugins = new DoPlugins(),
    adblocker = new AdBlocker(),
    homeComponent = new HomeComponent(),
    countOnceComponent = new CountOnceComponent(true),
    tailTarget = new TailTarget(),
    cleanVars = ['event31', 'list1'],
    metricOff = false;
  utils.addInVar('linkInternalFilters', 'uol.com.br');
  utils.addInVar('linkInternalFilters', 'bn.i.uol.com.br');
  utils.addInVar('linkInternalFilters', 'click.publicidade.uol.com.br');
  homeComponent.init();
  tailTarget.init();
  function uol_sc_doPlugins () {
    doPlugins.init();
  }
  doPlugins.clickUol = function () {
    if(uol_sc.lnk && (uol_sc.lnk.getAttribute && uol_sc.lnk.getAttribute('metricoff') == "true")) {
      homeComponent.disableMetrics();
      metricOff = true;
    }
    homeComponent.clickUol();
  };
  doPlugins.externalCampaignTracking = function () {
    if (!uol_sc.campaign) {
      uol_sc.eVar75 = uol_sc.campaign = uol_sc.getValOnce(uol_sc.getQueryParam('cmpid').replace(/\#.*/g, ''), 's_campaign', 0);
    }
  };
  UOLPD.Audience.homeClickComponent = function (obj) {
    homeComponent.clickComponent(obj);
  };
  UOLPD.Audience.clickComponent = function (obj) {
    homeComponent.countClick(obj);
  };
  UOLPD.Audience.countMetrics = function () {
    if (!homeComponent.removeRequest() && !homeComponent.errorPage()) {
      adblocker.init();
      countOnceComponent.init('widget-notificacoes-logado', 'widget-notificacoes-deslogado');
      uol_sc.t();
      utils.clearVars(cleanVars);
    }
  };
  UOLPD.Audience.countImpression = function (obj) {
    homeComponent.countImpression(obj);
    utils.clearVars(cleanVars);
  };
  UOLPD.Audience.requestBlocked = function (error) {
    adblocker.requestBlocked(error);
  };
  UOLPD.Audience.adblockerModal = function () {
    adblocker.adblockerModal();
  };
  UOLPD.Audience.countMetrics();
}(window, document));
window.omtrFormClick = function (omtrObj) {
  UOLPD.Audience.homeClickComponent(omtrObj);
  void 0;
};
      </script>

          var classes;
          classes = boxClasses.replace('hide', '');

          // registra storage para não repetir a mensagem
          storage.setItem('boxPaginaInicial', true);
        }

      <div>

<script>
  /*
   * Verifica se usuário optou por esconder módulo de BBB
   */
  if( storage.getItem('moduloBBB') == false ) {
    var moduloBBB         = document.getElementById('horizontal-bbb');
    var bbbClasses        = moduloBBB.className;
    var moduloEnqueteBBB  = document.getElementById('horizontal-bbb-votacao');
    var moduloNoticiasBBB = document.getElementById('horizontal-bbb-news');
    var classes           = ' bbbCloseNews';
    // se não existir módulo de votação, adiciona classe para desativar cores do módulo
    if( moduloEnqueteBBB == null ) {
      classes += ' bbbModuloGray bg30';
    }
    moduloNoticiasBBB.style.display = "none";
    moduloBBB.className = bbbClasses + classes;
  }
</script>

        <h1 class="titulo-jogos">
          <a href="http://jogosonline.uol.com.br/" name="jogos" data-metrics="mod-16;jogos" class="cor2 opacity80 cor-transition"><span class="icon-uol cor2 cor-transition"><em>UOL</em></span> jogos</a>

    <div class="destaque">
      <h2>
        <a href="http://jogosonline.uol.com.br/cut-the-rope-time-travel_61910.html" name="jogos-item1" data-metrics="mod-16;jogos">
          <img width="200" height="133" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" data-src="https://hp.imguol.com.br/c/home/1c/2016/06/25/cena-do-game-cut-the-rope---time-travel-1466875773927_300x200.jpg" alt="Reprodução" title="Reprodução" class="lazyload" />
          <noscript><img width="300" height="200" src="https://hp.imguol.com.br/c/home/1c/2016/06/25/cena-do-game-cut-the-rope---time-travel-1466875773927_300x200.jpg" alt="Reprodução" title="Reprodução" /></noscript>
          <strong class="chapeu cor2 cor18-hover cor-transition">
            Cut the Rope - Time Travel
          </strong>
          <span class="chamada corw cor2-hover cor-transition">
            Om Nom viajou no tempo para alimentar seus ancestrais com doces neste quebra-cabeça               <span class="comentariosContainer"></span>
          </span>
        </a>
      </h2>
    </div>
    <div class="chamadas">
      <h2>
        <a href="http://jogosonline.uol.com.br/prison-pockets_10450.html" name="jogos-item2" data-metrics="mod-16;jogos">

                <script type="text/javascript">
/*!
 *  Echo v1.4.0
 *  Copyright. MIT licensed.
 *
 *  Modificado por UOL.
 */
var echo = (function(window, document, undefined) {
  var store = [];
  var offset;
  var throttle;
  var poll;
  var _inView = function(el, i) {
    try {
      var coords = el.getBoundingClientRect();
      var topScroll = (window.pageYOffset || document.scrollTop || 0) - (document.clientTop || 0);
      return el.offsetWidth > 0 && ((coords.top >= 0 && coords.left >= 0 && coords.top) <= (window.innerHeight || document.documentElement.clientHeight) + offset && (topScroll + coords.top + offset >= topScroll));
    } catch(err) {
      // remove a imagem do array pois ela pode ter sido removida
      // do dom
      store.splice(i, 1);
    }
  };
  var _pollImages = function() {
    for (var i = store.length; i--;) {
      var self = store[i];
      if (_inView(self, i)) {
        self.src = self.getAttribute("data-original") || self.getAttribute("data-src");
        store.splice(i, 1);
      }
    }
  };
  var _throttle = function() {
    clearTimeout(poll);
    poll = setTimeout(_pollImages, throttle);
  };
  var _storeImg = function(nodes) {
    var t_images = nodes.length;
    for (var i = 0; i < t_images; i++) {
      var img = nodes[i];
      var className = img.className.toString();
      if (className.match(/lazyload/) && (img.getAttribute("data-original") || img.getAttribute("data-src"))) {
        store.push(img);
      }
    }
  };
  var init = function(obj) {
    var container = document.body;
    var nodes = container.getElementsByTagName("img");
    var opts = obj || {};
    offset = opts.offset || 0;
    throttle = opts.throttle || 250;
    _storeImg(nodes);
    _throttle();
    if (document.addEventListener) {
      window.addEventListener("scroll", _throttle, false);
      window.addEventListener("load", _throttle, false);
    } else {
      window.attachEvent("onscroll", _throttle);
      window.attachEvent("onload", _throttle);
    }
  };
  init({
    offset: 450,
    throttle: 150
  });
  return {
    addImages: function(container) {
      container = container.jquery ? container.get(0) : container;
      var nodes = container.getElementsByTagName("img");
      _storeImg(nodes);
      _throttle();
    },
    throttle: _throttle
  };
})(window, document);
/**
 * Registra que o lightbox deve ser exibido
 */
;(function() {
  // monta markup do lightbox
  if(location.hash.match(/^#404/)) {
    var body = document.body;
    var lightBg = document.createElement('div');
    lightBg.className = 'lightbox-bg';
    try {
      body.insertBefore(lightBg, body.firstChild);
      body.setAttribute('data-lightbox', '404');
    } catch(e) {  }
  }
})();
</script>

    <script type="text/template" class="module" data-module="topoPaginaInicial">

          </div>

          <p class="itemNumber cor2">2</p>
          <p class="itemSub">Em "Inicialização", selecione "Abre uma página específica ou um conjunto de páginas". Depois, clique em <b>Configurar Páginas</b>.</p>
        </li>
        <li>
          <p class="itemNumber cor2">3</p>
          <p class="itemSub">No campo "Adicionar nova página", digite: http://www.uol.com.br <br>Clique em <b>Ok</b> e o processo será concluído.</p>

            que fica ao lado direito da barra de endereços e está sinalizando com uma imagem de engrenagem. Escolha "<b>Opções de Internet</b>" (Internet Options).
          </div>
        </li>

          <p class="itemNumber cor2">2</p>

  <script>(function() {
